abstract: British government details measures intended to fight radicalization of young Muslims; plan calls for promoting British values alongside preventing influence of extremism in mosques and on social media; critics warn that crucial moderate voices may balk over conflicting conceptions of British values.
lead_paragraph: The strategy announced by Prime Minister David Cameron includes a range of measures, stoking a debate about how aggressively the government should confront extremist ideologies.

headline.main: Britain Unveils Plans to Fight Extremism in Young Muslims
headline.print_headline: Britain Announces a New Strategy to Prevent the Radicalization of Young Muslims

snippet: The strategy announced by Prime Minister David Cameron includes a range of measures, stoking a debate about how aggressively the government should confront extremist ideologies.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
